oai_dc:dc.dc:title: choosiny that special pet
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Radford, Elaine
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: As an addicted reader and writer of science fiction, I'm sometimes amused by my colleagues' mention of scientifically designed pets. You and I know that there's no reason to wait for the genetic engineers to do their stuff in order to have a galaxy of choices for the perfect companion. The large and varied class of birds already contains enough species to match almost any lifestyle. The real trick is deciding which of the feathered charmers is right for you, your family, or your customers. The following
